title: Environmental Cleaning | Public Health Ontario
description: Cleaning and disinfection of the physical environment in hospitals and health care settings for prevention of infections.
cleaned_text: Environmental Cleaning Cleaning and disinfection of the physical environment in hospitals and health care settings is important. This reduces the numbers of microorganisms that may potentially be transmitted to other individuals. Environmental cleaning is typically performed by cleaning or housekeeping services in a facility. We provide guidance, support, and resources to help you follow best practices for environmental cleaning. Infection Prevention and Control for Environmental Cleaning in Health Care Resources and online learning modules for stakeholders seeking education and training on IPAC and environmental cleaning. This suite of products is intended for both frontline environmental service workers and management, as well as infection control professionals, working in all health care settings.
